rule_of_thirds.description: Divide the frame into 9 equal parts using 2 horizontal and 2 vertical lines. Place key elements at intersections.

golden_ratio.description: Use the 1:1.618 ratio for naturally pleasing proportions.

negative_space.description: Leave intentional empty areas to create breathing room and space for text overlays.

leading_lines.description: Use lines to guide the viewer's eye toward the product.

framing.description: Use elements to frame the subject and draw attention.

visual_hierarchy.focal_point: The product should always be the primary focal point
visual_hierarchy.secondary_elements: Props and background support but don't compete

soft_studio.description: Even, diffused lighting that eliminates harsh shadows
soft_studio.prompt: soft studio lighting, diffused light, even illumination, no harsh shadows

golden_hour.description: Warm, directional light that creates depth and warmth
golden_hour.prompt: golden hour lighting, warm sunlight, long shadows, orange-tinted ambient light

natural_window.description: Soft directional light from a window source
natural_window.prompt: natural window light, soft directional lighting, gentle shadows, indoor natural light

dramatic_contrast.description: High contrast lighting with defined shadows
dramatic_contrast.prompt: dramatic lighting, high contrast, defined shadows, chiaroscuro effect

backlit_glow.description: Light from behind creating rim lighting and glow
backlit_glow.prompt: backlit, rim lighting, glowing edges, ethereal atmosphere

flat_lay.description: Even overhead lighting for top-down shots
flat_lay.prompt: flat lay lighting, overhead even light, minimal shadows, clean top-down

authentic_imperfect.description: Content that feels real and tactile rather than overly polished

biophilic_design.description: Integration of natural elements and organic materials

tactile_craft.description: Emphasis on texture and handmade quality

warm_tones.description: Shift toward warm, earthy color palettes

minimal_clean.name: Minimal Clean
minimal_clean.description: Simple, uncluttered compositions with focus on the product
minimal_clean.prompt_template: Professional product photography of {product}, minimalist composition, {background} background, soft studio lighting, clean aesthetic, sharp focus, ample negative space for text, commercial quality, 8K detail
minimal_clean.negative_prompt: cluttered, busy background, harsh shadows, distracting elements, text, watermark

lifestyle_warm.name: Lifestyle Warm
lifestyle_warm.description: Cozy, inviting scenes that show products in context
lifestyle_warm.prompt_template: Lifestyle product photography of {product} in a cozy {context}, warm natural lighting, {props} as styling elements, inviting atmosphere, shallow depth of field, authentic feel, space in {text_zone} for text overlay, warm color palette
lifestyle_warm.negative_prompt: cold lighting, sterile environment, artificial look, harsh shadows, cluttered

editorial_magazine.name: Editorial Magazine
editorial_magazine.description: High-impact compositions suitable for magazine spreads
editorial_magazine.prompt_template: Editorial product photography of {product}, dramatic composition, {lighting} lighting, strong visual impact, magazine-quality, bold negative space on {text_zone} for headline, high contrast, fashion photography aesthetic, premium feel
editorial_magazine.negative_prompt: busy, cluttered, amateur, flat lighting, boring composition

authentic_imperfect.name: Authentic Imperfect
authentic_imperfect.description: Real, tactile aesthetic that embraces natural imperfections
authentic_imperfect.prompt_template: Authentic product photography of {product} on {surface}, natural daylight, organic textures, handcrafted aesthetic, subtle imperfections that feel real and tactile, warm earthy tones, {text_zone} area for text, artisanal quality
authentic_imperfect.negative_prompt: overly perfect, artificial, plastic, too polished, sterile, clinical

biophilic_nature.name: Biophilic Nature
biophilic_nature.description: Integration with natural elements and organic environment
biophilic_nature.prompt_template: Biophilic product photography of {product} surrounded by {natural_elements}, natural lighting, green plants and organic materials, nature-integrated composition, fresh and alive feeling, sustainable aesthetic, {text_zone} for text, earthy color palette
biophilic_nature.negative_prompt: artificial plants, plastic, synthetic materials, indoor sterile environment

pharmacy_clinical.name: Pharmacy Clinical
pharmacy_clinical.description: Clean, trustworthy aesthetic for pharmaceutical and health products
pharmacy_clinical.prompt_template: Professional pharmaceutical product photography of {product}, clean clinical aesthetic, soft even studio lighting, {background} background, trustworthy and professional feel, medical-grade cleanliness, sharp focus on product details and packaging, {text_zone} for dosage or info text, reassuring healthcare aesthetic, 8K commercial quality
pharmacy_clinical.negative_prompt: dirty, cluttered, unprofessional, scary medical imagery, syringes, blood, harsh lighting

pharmacy_wellness.name: Pharmacy Wellness
pharmacy_wellness.description: Warm, approachable health and wellness aesthetic
pharmacy_wellness.prompt_template: Wellness product photography of {product}, natural and healthy aesthetic, soft natural lighting, surrounded by {props} suggesting natural ingredients, approachable healthcare feel, warm but clean, {text_zone} for product info, holistic wellness mood, 8K detail
pharmacy_wellness.negative_prompt: clinical sterile, cold, intimidating, chemical, artificial, plastic

wine_elegant.name: Wine Elegant
wine_elegant.description: Sophisticated, premium wine and spirits presentation
wine_elegant.prompt_template: Elegant wine photography of {product}, dramatic moody lighting with highlights on bottle glass, {background} setting, premium sophisticated aesthetic, {props} as subtle styling, rich deep colors, condensation or reflection details visible, {text_zone} for wine name and vintage, sommelier-quality presentation, 8K detail
wine_elegant.negative_prompt: cheap looking, bright harsh lighting, plastic cups, casual, unprofessional

wine_casual.name: Wine Casual
wine_casual.description: Approachable, lifestyle wine presentation for everyday moments
wine_casual.prompt_template: Lifestyle wine photography of {product} in a {context} setting, warm golden lighting, approachable and inviting atmosphere, {props} creating social moment, everyday luxury feel, {text_zone} for casual text, relatable wine moment, 8K quality
wine_casual.negative_prompt: stuffy, pretentious, too formal, dark cellar, intimidating

medical_professional.name: Medical Professional
medical_professional.description: Authoritative, trustworthy medical and healthcare aesthetic
medical_professional.prompt_template: Professional medical product photography of {product}, authoritative healthcare aesthetic, clean soft studio lighting, {background} environment, trustworthy and precise feel, medical-grade presentation, {text_zone} for medical information, clinical excellence, 8K sharp detail
medical_professional.negative_prompt: scary, blood, needles prominent, pain imagery, unprofessional, dirty, casual

luxury_premium.name: Luxury Premium
luxury_premium.prompt_template: Luxury product photography of {product}, premium high-end aesthetic, dramatic studio lighting with elegant highlights, {background} surface, {props} as luxurious accents, aspirational sophistication, {text_zone} for brand text, exclusive premium feel, 8K commercial quality
luxury_premium.negative_prompt: cheap, budget, casual, everyday, plastic, mass-market

tech_futuristic.name: Tech Futuristic
tech_futuristic.prompt_template: Futuristic tech product photography of {product}, innovative cutting-edge aesthetic, dramatic lighting with {accent_color} accent glow, {background} backdrop, floating or dynamic angle, premium technology feel, sleek modern lines, {text_zone} for specs text, next-gen product reveal, 8K detail
tech_futuristic.negative_prompt: outdated, retro, warm cozy, natural, organic, cluttered cables

artisan_craft.name: Artisan Craft
artisan_craft.prompt_template: Artisan product photography of {product}, handcrafted small-batch aesthetic, natural workshop lighting, surrounded by {props} showing the craft process, authentic maker quality, visible texture and craftsmanship, {text_zone} for artisan story, genuine handmade feel, 8K detail
artisan_craft.negative_prompt: mass produced, factory, industrial, perfect, sterile, corporate

eco_sustainable.name: Eco Sustainable
eco_sustainable.prompt_template: Eco-friendly product photography of {product}, sustainable and environmentally conscious aesthetic, natural daylight, {background} setting with {props}, earth-friendly presentation, green and natural color palette, {text_zone} for eco messaging, authentic sustainability, 8K quality
eco_sustainable.negative_prompt: plastic, synthetic, wasteful, polluting imagery, corporate greenwashing

pet_friendly.name: Pet Friendly
pet_friendly.composition: product with pet context, loving atmosphere
pet_friendly.prompt_template: Pet product photography of {product}, warm and loving pet-friendly aesthetic, soft natural lighting, {background} setting, {props} creating pet-loving context, happy and healthy pet lifestyle, {text_zone} for product info, heartwarming pet care feel, 8K detail
pet_friendly.negative_prompt: sad pets, cages, clinical vet imagery, harsh, cold, unfriendly

kids_playful.name: Kids Playful
kids_playful.description: Fun, colorful, safe kids product aesthetic
kids_playful.prompt_template: Playful kids product photography of {product}, fun and colorful child-friendly aesthetic, bright even lighting, {background} setting, {props} creating playful context, safe and engaging feel, vibrant colors, {text_zone} for fun text, joyful childhood energy, 8K quality
kids_playful.negative_prompt: dark, scary, adult themes, sharp objects, dangerous, boring, dull colors

sports_dynamic.name: Sports Dynamic
sports_dynamic.description: Energetic, action-oriented sports and fitness aesthetic
sports_dynamic.prompt_template: Dynamic sports product photography of {product}, energetic athletic aesthetic, dramatic lighting with motion energy, {background} context, {props} suggesting peak performance, powerful and dynamic feel, {text_zone} for performance text, champion athlete energy, 8K action quality
sports_dynamic.negative_prompt: static, lazy, sedentary, slow, weak, passive, boring

text_zone_descriptions.top-center: clear negative space in upper third for headline text
text_zone_descriptions.bottom-left: open area in bottom-left corner for price badge
text_zone_descriptions.left-third: negative space on left side for vertical text
text_zone_descriptions.right-third: empty area on right side for text overlay

feed_post.notes: 4:5 is optimal for grid view, takes more screen space than square

story.notes: Avoid placing critical elements in top 250px (profile) and bottom 340px (reply bar)

square.notes: Classic format, works well for carousel posts

reel_cover.notes: Cover image for Reels, key content in center
